title: Create Basic Gating Test for Integration Test Validation
description: As a developer, I want to create a basic gating test that validates integration test execution and results, so that I can ensure integration tests are properly functioning before deployment.
acceptanceCriteria: Given integration tests exist in the system
When the gating test is executed
Then it should verify all integration tests pass
And it should report any failing tests with clear error messages
And it should complete within 30 seconds
And it should return appropriate exit codes (0 for success, 1 for failure)

acceptanceTests.name: Gating Test Execution
acceptanceTests.description: Verify gating test can execute and validate integration tests
steps: Check exit code and output format
acceptanceTests.expectedResult: All integration tests execute successfully with proper reporting

acceptanceTests.name: Error Handling
acceptanceTests.description: Verify gating test properly handles integration test failures
steps: Verify failure is detected and reported
Check appropriate exit code is returned
acceptanceTests.expectedResult: Failing tests are identified with clear error messages
